document_data.caption: Common jugglables.
document_data.name: Jugglables
document_data.mainbody: '''Jugglables''' were small items in the Realms popular among [[bard]]s who would juggle with them.
document_data.Description: Jugglables included [[leather ball]]s, small [[knives]], [[bean-bag]]s, wooden [[plate]]s, etc.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 7 [[copper piece]]s–2 [[gold piece]]s depending on the nature of the set.
